com.tomtom.speedtools.geometry

Class Geo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomtom.speedtools.geometry.Geo

  • public final class Geo
extends Object
    Utility class for geometry package. It provides a number of geo-relevant constants as well as methods to convert degrees to distances, extend geo-areas (to include specific points, for \example) and estimate travel times from one point to another.

      • grow

        @Nonnull
public static GeoRectangle grow(@Nullable
                                         GeoRectangle rectangle,
                                         @Nonnull
                                         GeoPoint point)
        Grow a rectangle to contain a(n additional) point.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - Rectangle, or null.
        point - Point to add.
        Returns:
        Rectangle containing point.

      • degreesLatToMeters

        public static double degreesLatToMeters(double latDegrees)
        Convert a number of degrees latitude to meters.
        Parameters:
        latDegrees - Degrees in latitude to convert.
        Returns:
        Meters.

      • degreesLonToMetersAtLat

        public static double degreesLonToMetersAtLat(double lonDegrees,
                                             double lat)
        Given a reference latitude, convert a number of meters to degrees longitude.
        Parameters:
        lonDegrees - Degrees in longitude to convert.
        lat - Latitude at which the degrees need to be converted.
        Returns:
        Meters.

      • metersToDegreesLat

        public static double metersToDegreesLat(double northMeters)
        Convert a number of meters pointing North to degrees latitude. This approximation works only for relatively small distances (say, up to 500km).
        Parameters:
        northMeters - Distance to North in meters.
        Returns:
        Degrees latitude.

      • metersToDegreesLonAtLat

        public static double metersToDegreesLonAtLat(double eastMeters,
                                             double lat)
        Given a reference latitude, convert a number of meters to degrees longitude.
        Parameters:
        eastMeters - Distance to East in meters.
        lat - Latitude at which the meters are measured to the East.
        Returns:
        Degrees latitude.

      • distanceInMeters

        public static double distanceInMeters(@Nonnull
                                      GeoPoint p1,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      GeoPoint p2)
        Calculate the shortest distance between GeoPoints. This is an approximation, that works fine for relative small distances, say up to 200km.
        Parameters:
        p1 - Point 1.
        p2 - Point 2.
        Returns:
        Distance, always >= 0.

      • mapToLat

        public static double mapToLat(double lat)
        Constrain a value to legal values of latitude, -90..90.
        Parameters:
        lat - Latitude. Values outside this range are simply cut off to the north/south pole latitudes.
        Returns:
        Latitude within range -90..90.

      • mapToLon

        public static double mapToLon(double value)
        Map a longitude to [-180, 180). Values outside this range are wrapped to this range.
        Parameters:
        value - Longitude, any range.
        Returns:
        Mapped to [-180, 180).

      • estimatedMinTravelTime

        @Nonnull
public static org.joda.time.Duration estimatedMinTravelTime(@Nonnull
                                                                     GeoPoint from,
                                                                     @Nonnull
                                                                     GeoPoint to)
        Return a best estimate for the minimum travel time required to get from A to B. This method must be optimized for calculation speed and is not allowed to call out to other systems, or databases.
        Parameters:
        from - From point A.
        to - To point B.
        Returns:
        Estimated minimum travel time.

      • estimatedMinTravelTime

        @Nonnull
public static org.joda.time.Duration estimatedMinTravelTime(@Nonnull
                                                                     GeoPoint from,
                                                                     @Nonnull
                                                                     GeoPoint to,
                                                                     int roundToMeters)
        Return a best estimate for the minimum travel time required to get from A to B. The estimate is based on the distance rounded to the roundToMeters given. This method must be optimized for calculation speed and is not allowed to call out to other systems, or databases.
        Parameters:
        from - From point A.
        to - To point B.
        roundToMeters - The number of metres the distance should be rounded to before calculation (must be >= 0).
        Returns:
        Estimated minimum travel time.
